title: "Default Gateway is not available"
body: This isn't normally an issue that I would put on the League forums, but it's mostly during my gameplay that I encounter the issue where me wifi adapter decides to give me an afk queue, making me exit the game and troubleshoot to get back in. Does anyone know of a possible solution to this, or if it's actually League that's messing with my adapter?

replies.body: Sounds like your wireless connection is timing out betweem or pc and your router xould be weak signal or driver issues

This error is usually an indication that there's something wrong with the network adapter. I would start by ensuring the driver is up to date by going to the manufacturer's support site and searching for drivers. If you continue to have issues, then I would try another wireless adapter or switch to a wired connection. If the issue goes away while using another adapter, it confirms the adapter itself is faulty and should be replaced.

Let me know if you have any questions.
